Name: PvZ2_Prerelease_ZenGarden_P4_fixed1

Updates.en: !!Fixed the bug that causes plants spawning on wrong positions in Zen Garden!!
Updates.zh: !!修复花园中种出不符合位置特性植物的问题!!

Updates.en: !!Fixed the bug that causes plants Threepeaters' projectiles not being affected by Appease-mints!!
Updates.zh: !!修复三线射手子弹不受平射薄荷影响的问题!!

Updates.en: Added medals for other plant families (without mints).
Updates.zh: 为其他家族植物加入徽章系统（不包括薄荷）。

Updates.en: Adjusted the plants supply weights in Zen Garden to better align with current demands.
Updates.zh: 调整花园植物供应权重，使之更符合当下需求。
加入寒冻薄荷、锋利薄荷、启明薄荷、平射薄荷。

NewFeatures: !!修复花园中种出不符合位置特性植物的问题!!
!!修复三线射手子弹不受平射薄荷影响的问题!!
为其他家族植物加入徽章系统（不包括薄荷）。
调整花园植物供应权重，使之更符合当下需求。
加入寒冻薄荷、锋利薄荷、启明薄荷、平射薄荷。
EnNewFeatures: !!Fixed the bug that causes plants spawning on wrong positions in Zen Garden!!
!!Fixed the bug that causes plants Threepeaters' projectiles not being affected by Appease-mints!!
Added medals for other plant families (without mints).
Adjusted the plants supply weights in Zen Garden to better align with current demands.
